OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupThermalFoundation
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Distribution options for Thermal Foundation Ores.

Choice.description: Copper is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: thfoCopperFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Thermal Foundation Copper distributions

OptionNumeric.name: thfoCopperSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Thermal Foundation Copper distributions

Choice.description: Tin is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: thfoTinFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Thermal Foundation Tin distributions

OptionNumeric.name: thfoTinSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Thermal Foundation Tin distributions

Choice.description: Silver is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: thfoSilverFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Thermal Foundation Silver distributions

OptionNumeric.name: thfoSilverSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Thermal Foundation Silver distributions

Choice.description: Lead is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: thfoLeadFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Thermal Foundation Lead distributions

OptionNumeric.name: thfoLeadSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Thermal Foundation Lead distributions

Choice.description: Ferrous is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: thfoFerrousFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Thermal Foundation Ferrous distributions

OptionNumeric.name: thfoFerrousSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Thermal Foundation Ferrous distributions

Choice.description: Shiny is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: thfoShinyFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Thermal Foundation Shiny distributions

OptionNumeric.name: thfoShinySize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Thermal Foundation Shiny distributions

OptionChoice.name: thfoManaInfusedDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Mana Infused is generated

Choice.description: Mana Infused is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: thfoManaInfusedFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Thermal Foundation Mana Infused distributions

OptionNumeric.name: thfoManaInfusedSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Thermal Foundation Mana Infused distributions

Substitute.name: thfoOverworldOreSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Veins.name: thfoCopperBaseVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

Veins.name: thfoCopperPrefersVeins
Veins.Description: Spawns 2 more times in preferred biomes.

Veins.name: thfoCopperBaseVeins
Veins.Description: Very large, extremely rare motherlodes. Each motherlode has many long slender branches - so thin that parts of the branch won't contain any ore at all. This, combined with the incredible length of the branches, makes them more challenging to follow underground. Once found, however, a motherlode contains enough ore to keep a player supplied for a very long time. The rarity of these veins might be too frustrating in a single-player setting. In SMP, though, teamwork could make finding them much easier and the motherlodes are big enough to supply several people without shortage. This might be a good way to add challenge to multiplayer worlds. Credit: based on feedback by dyrewulf from the MC forums.

Veins.name: thfoCopperPrefersVeins
Veins.Description: Spawns 2 more times in preferred biomes.

Cloud.name: thfoCopperBaseCloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi-permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore.

Veins.name: thfoCopperBaseHintVeins
Veins.Description: Single blocks, generously scattered through all heights (density is about that of vanilla iron ore). They will replace dirt and sandstone (but not grass or sand), so they can be found nearer to the surface than most ores. Intened to be used as a child distribution for large, rare strategic deposits that would otherwise be very difficult to find.

Veins.name: thfoManaInfusedBaseVeins
Veins.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore. Because they contain less ore per volume, these veins are relatively wide and long. Mining the ore from them is time consuming compared to solid ore veins. They are also more difficult to follow, since it is harder to get an idea of their direction while mining.

Veins.name: thfoManaInfusedPrefersVeins
Veins.Description: Spawns 4 more times in preferred biomes.

Veins.name: thfoManaInfusedBaseVeins
Veins.Description: Small motherlodes without any branches. Similar to the deposits produced by StandardGen distributions.

Veins.name: thfoManaInfusedPrefersVeins
Veins.Description: Spawns 4 more times in preferred biomes.
